text: An aqueous solution was prepared by dissolving the appropriate amount of NiCl2*6H2O or/and CoCl2*6H2O
8 ml hydrazine hydrate (N2H4.H2O, 99%) was added under constant stirring for 30 min.
The mixture was transferred to a stainless Teflon-lined 100 mL autoclave, and heated at 140 degC for 12 h.
After cooling to room temperature, the products were filtered off, washed with distilled water and absolute ethanol several times, and then dried in vacuum at 50 degC for 3 h.
